name: C Library Management System
description: A robust command-line application for managing library inventory and user borrowing records, focusing on efficient memory management and pointer usage.

name: Rust Network Sniffer
description: A high-performance network packet sniffer built with Rust. Captures and analyzes network traffic on ARCH Linux, demonstrating systems programming skills.

name: Dockerized Web App Stack
description: Containerized a full-stack application using Docker Compose, integrating Express.js and MySQL. Optimized for deployment on AWS EC2 instances.

name: Proxmox Virtual Lab Setup
description: Configuration files and guides for setting up a secure virtual lab environment in Proxmox, used for penetration testing and system administration practice.

name: Reverse Engineering Challenge Writeup
description: A comprehensive writeup for a crackme challenge, detailing the process of reversing the binary, patching the code, and solving the puzzle.
